advancements.copperfarm.descr: Collect 2 stacks of exposed copper, 2 stacks of weathered copper, and 2 stacks of oxidized copper
advancements.copperfarm.title: Copper Oxidizer
advancements.coralfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of any type of coral fan

advancements.drownedfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of rotten flesh, 4 stacks of copper ingots, and 1 trident
advancements.drownedfarm.title: Trident Farm
advancements.flowerfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of any type of flower
advancements.flowerfarm.title: Flower Farm

advancements.lavachicken.title: Chicken Cooker
advancements.leaffarm.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of leaves

advancements.potionfarm.title: Potion Farm
advancements.seapicklefarm.title: Sea Pickle Generator
advancements.snifferfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of torchflower seeds or 4 stacks of pitcher pods

advancements.snowfarm.title: Snow Generator
advancements.squidfarm.descr: Collect 4 stacks of ink sacs or 4 stacks of glow ink sacs

advancements.froglightfarm.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of froglight

advancements.ripeningmachine.descr: Collect 9 stacks of any type of ripening crop

advancements.mudfarm.title: mudfarm Farm

advancements.curcuitrevolution.descr: Efficiency is Minecraft's limit, not mine!
advancements.abovenether.title: Nether Roof
advancements.abovenether.descr: A vast place in Nether without anything

advancements.perimobfarm.descr: Grain 1 box of Bone and Rotten flesh
advancements.pericreeperfarm.title: Perimeter Creeper Farm

advancements.periwitherskel.descr: Grain 1 box of Wither Skeleton Skull
advancements.periguardianfarm.title: Perimeter Guardian Farm

advancements.fastesttravel.descr: Use Ender Pearl Cannon to teleport into 10000m away

emi.automationera.circuit.title: Circuit Page
emi.automationera.circuit.descr: The title is the name of the circuit. Text below title is the descriptions about how to build the circuit. The image is about the structure of the circuit, only use for understand how to work. The bars are output products (farms) or link blocks (special machines). The WIKI button is used to open the wiki page of the circuit
emi.automationera.iron.title: Iron Farm - Iron
emi.automationera.iron.descr: Use zombies or pillagers to frighten villagers and spawn iron golems, then kill them to obtain iron ingots.
emi.automationera.stone.title: Cobblestone Generator - Cobblestone
emi.automationera.stone.descr: Generate cobblestone using water and lava, then use a TNT duplicator to blast and collect cobblestone.
emi.automationera.wood.title: Tree Farm - Logs
emi.automationera.wood.descr: Hold saplings in your hand and bonemeal in your offhand. Use a TNT duplicator to blow up grown trees for logs.
emi.automationera.mob.title: Mob Farm - Summon monsters
emi.automationera.mob.descr: AFK 128 blocks above ground to limit the mob spawn area for high-efficiency mob farming.
emi.automationera.farm.title: Villager Auto Farm - Carrots/Potatoes
emi.automationera.farm.descr: Use the villager food sharing mechanic to automatically harvest and collect crops.
emi.automationera.sand.title: Sand Duplicator - Falling Blocks
emi.automationera.sand.descr: Use the End portal entity bouncing method to duplicate and collect falling blocks (see Wiki for details).
emi.automationera.ice.title: Ice Farm - Ice
emi.automationera.ice.descr: Create ice at high altitudes and manually mine it with Silk Touch tools.
emi.automationera.rail.title: Rail Duplicator - Rails
emi.automationera.rail.descr: Duplicate rails using coral fans or use piston pushers to automatically farm rails.
emi.automationera.bonemeal.title: Bonemeal Farm - Bonemeal/Moss
emi.automationera.bonemeal.descr: Use bonemeal to convert stone to moss, compost moss for bonemeal, and loop the process for positive feedback.
emi.automationera.sugarcane.title: Sugar Cane Farm - Sugar Cane
emi.automationera.sugarcane.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.wart.title: Nether Wart Farm - Nether Wart
emi.automationera.wart.descr: Manually plant nether wart and use water to harvest after it matures.
emi.automationera.bamboo.title: Bamboo Farm - Bamboo
emi.automationera.bamboo.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.pork.title: Hoglin Farm - Porkchop
emi.automationera.pork.descr: Use warped fungus to lure hoglins in crimson forests into a kill chamber.
emi.automationera.slime.title: Swamp Slime Farm - Slimeballs
emi.automationera.slime.descr: AFK 128 blocks above to limit spawn area and maximize slime spawns. Use iron golems to lure slimes into kill chambers.
emi.automationera.enderman.title: Enderman Farm - Ender Pearls/EXP
emi.automationera.enderman.descr: Use endermites to attract and anger endermen, leading them into a trap for killing.
emi.automationera.pigman.title: Pigman Farm - Gold/EXP
emi.automationera.pigman.descr: Use player aggression to lure zombified piglins into kill chambers for gold and XP.
emi.automationera.cactus.title: Cactus Farm
emi.automationera.cactus.descr: Cacti grow next to fences and automatically break off upon growth for easy collection.
emi.automationera.trade.title: Villager Trading Hall
emi.automationera.trade.descr: Trap villagers in booths with magma blocks or campfires underneath for safe trading.
emi.automationera.melon.title: Melon Farm - Melon/Pumpkin
emi.automationera.melon.descr: See structure in image. Detect crop growth and push to harvest.
emi.automationera.basalt.title: Basalt Farm
emi.automationera.basalt.descr: Generate basalt using ice, soul soil, and lava, then use TNT duplicators to blast and collect it.
emi.automationera.berry.title: Sweet Berry Farm
emi.automationera.berry.descr: Use foxes to harvest sweet berries and minecarts to collect them automatically.
emi.automationera.blade.title: Blaze Farm - Blaze Rods
emi.automationera.blade.descr: Use magma blocks to gather blazes and funnel them into a kill chamber.
emi.automationera.chicken.title: Chicken Farm - Eggs/Cooked Chicken
emi.automationera.chicken.descr: Automatically collect eggs; surplus chickens are cooked with lava or fire for cooked chicken.
emi.automationera.chorus.title: Chorus Fruit Farm - Chorus Fruit
emi.automationera.chorus.descr: Use TNT duplicators to blast chorus flowers and move end stone to let chorus fruit drop.
emi.automationera.clay.title: Azalea Clay Farm - Dirt/Mud/Clay
emi.automationera.clay.descr: Grow azalea to turn stone into dirt, use water bottles for mud, and dripstone to dry mud into clay.
emi.automationera.concrete.title: Concrete Converter - Concrete
emi.automationera.concrete.descr: Hold an efficiency pickaxe in your hand and concrete powder in your offhand, then use auto-clicking and water to instantly convert and mine concrete.
emi.automationera.copper.title: Copper Weathering Farm - Oxidized Copper
emi.automationera.copper.descr: Expose copper blocks to air for natural oxidation, use pistons to move, then TNT for collection.
emi.automationera.cow.title: Cow Cooker - Steak
emi.automationera.cow.descr: Breed cows in pens and kill adults for steak after calves grow up.
emi.automationera.creeper.title: Creeper Farm - Gunpowder
emi.automationera.creeper.descr: Use trapdoors and carpets to filter and farm only creepers for gunpowder.
emi.automationera.cristal.title: Amethyst Farm - Amethyst
emi.automationera.cristal.descr: Use redstone clocks to activate pistons and periodically harvest budding amethyst clusters.
emi.automationera.dripstone.title: Dripstone Farm - Dripstone
emi.automationera.dripstone.descr: See structure in image. Detect dripstone growth and push to harvest.
emi.automationera.drone.title: Drowned Farm - Copper Ingots
emi.automationera.drone.descr: Drowned sink in water streams and are concentrated into kill chambers for copper ingots.
emi.automationera.flower.title: Flower Farm
emi.automationera.flower.descr: Spawn more flower varieties in a flower forest biome and use water streams to collect them.
emi.automationera.froglight.title: Froglight Farm
emi.automationera.froglight.descr: Spawn magma cubes in basalt deltas, slow them with powdered snow or sweet berries, and let frogs eat the small cubes to create froglights.
emi.automationera.ghast.title: Ghast Farm - Ghast Tears
emi.automationera.ghast.descr: Kill ghasts using magma blocks and wither roses, then collect tears with minecarts.
emi.automationera.honey.title: Bee Farm - Honey/Honeycomb
emi.automationera.honey.descr: Automatically detect hive status and use dispensers to collect honey (with bottles) and honeycomb (with shears).
emi.automationera.hook.title: Tripwire Hook Farm - Tripwire Hooks
emi.automationera.hook.descr: Build a specialized tripwire hook farm; trade with fletchers for emeralds in mid-game.
emi.automationera.kelp.title: Kelp Farm
emi.automationera.kelp.descr: See structure in image. Detect kelp growth and push to harvest automatically.
emi.automationera.leaf.title: Leaf Farm
emi.automationera.leaf.descr: Semi-automatically shear leaves. Waterlogged leaves are excellent blast-resistant building materials.
emi.automationera.magmacube.title: Magma Cube Farm
emi.automationera.magmacube.descr: Spawn magma cubes in basalt deltas and lure them with iron golems into kill chambers.
emi.automationera.marine.title: Guardian Farm - Prismarine
emi.automationera.marine.descr: In one dimension, bubble columns push guardians to fall and die; in two dimensions, send them to the Nether for quick killing. Mainly for sea lanterns.
emi.automationera.mushroom.title: Mushroom Farm
emi.automationera.mushroom.descr: Detect mushroom spreading and push to harvest. Fully automatic but low efficiency per farm.
emi.automationera.mushroom2.title: Fungus Tree Farm - Mushrooms
emi.automationera.mushroom2.descr: Hold mushrooms in hand and bonemeal in offhand, then use a TNT duplicator to blast giant mushrooms.
emi.automationera.obsidian.title: Portal Obsidian Farm (1.21+)
emi.automationera.obsidian.descr: Let withers break Nether portals in 1.21+ to obtain obsidian.
emi.automationera.pickle.title: Sea Pickle Farm - Sea Pickles
emi.automationera.pickle.descr: Bonemeal sea pickles and use pistons to break the block below, causing pickles to drop for collection.
emi.automationera.piglin.title: Piglin Bartering Hall - Quartz/Obsidian
emi.automationera.piglin.descr: Stack massive numbers of piglins, throw gold ingots to start bartering and obtain various loot.
emi.automationera.rabbit.title: Cooked Rabbit Farm - Rabbit's Foot
emi.automationera.rabbit.descr: Breed rabbits in pens; after they mature, kill them to collect rabbit's feet for brewing.
emi.automationera.raid.title: Raid Farm (Low Versions) - Emeralds/Redstone
emi.automationera.raid.descr: Killing raid captains during raids without Bad Omen effect enables infinite raids for emeralds, redstone, and totems.
emi.automationera.ripend.title: Ripening Machine
emi.automationera.ripend.descr: Semi-automatic bonemeal-powered ripening machine for crops.
emi.automationera.sheep.title: Wool Farm - Wool
emi.automationera.sheep.descr: Automatically detect grass block state and shear sheep.
emi.automationera.shulker.title: Shulker Farm - Shulker Shells
emi.automationera.shulker.descr: Use shulker bullets to duplicate shulkers, enabling automatic shulker shell production.
emi.automationera.sniffer.title: Sniffer Farm - Torchflower/Pitcher Pod
emi.automationera.sniffer.descr: Sniffers automatically produce seeds, which are collected by hoppers.
emi.automationera.snow.title: Snow Farm - Snowballs
emi.automationera.snow.descr: Semi-automatically use a shovel to collect snow blocks below snow golems.
emi.automationera.squid.title: Squid Farm - Ink Sacs
emi.automationera.squid.descr: Spawn squids in rivers or ocean biomes, let them sink and gather for easy killing.
emi.automationera.string.title: String Farm - String
emi.automationera.string.descr: See structure in image. Fastest early-game emerald trading method.
emi.automationera.turtle.title: Turtle Farm - Turtle Eggs
emi.automationera.turtle.descr: Primarily used to collect turtle eggs.
emi.automationera.wheat.title: Wheat Farm - Wheat
emi.automationera.wheat.descr: Fill villager inventories with seeds so they drop wheat for minecart collection.
emi.automationera.witch.title: Witch Farm - Redstone
emi.automationera.witch.descr: Use witch huts to spawn and kill witches for redstone.
emi.automationera.wither.title: Wither Killer - Nether Star
emi.automationera.wither.descr: Manually place soul sand to spawn the wither, then trap and kill it with obsidian.
emi.automationera.witherrose.title: Wither Rose Farm - Wither Roses
emi.automationera.witherrose.descr: Let withers kill mobs to produce wither roses.
emi.automationera.witherskel.title: Wither Skeleton Farm
emi.automationera.witherskel.descr: Use soul sand and wither roses in Nether fortresses to spawn wither skeletons, then lure and kill them with iron golems.
emi.automationera.allay.title: Allay Sorter
emi.automationera.allay.descr: Use allay bound to a note block to throw collected designated items into a hopper.
emi.automationera.bat.title: Bat Farm
emi.automationera.bat.descr: AFK to let bats spawn in low areas and use piston worms to send them into the Nether portal.
emi.automationera.bedrock.title: Bedrock Breaker
emi.automationera.bedrock.descr: Uses special structures to break bedrock. See image for details.
emi.automationera.brew.title: Single-Item Brewer
emi.automationera.brew.descr: Place as many layers of hoppers & droppers above the structure as there are brewing steps.
emi.automationera.carpet.title: Carpet Duplicator
emi.automationera.carpet.descr: Three designs: slime-free, coral fan duplication, and single-core basic version.
emi.automationera.cat.title: Cat Farm
emi.automationera.cat.descr: Use village cats, attract them with rabbits, and send them to the Nether through portals.
emi.automationera.classify.title: Basic Sorter
emi.automationera.classify.descr: See image for structure; top hopper uses 41 of the sorted item + 4 different fillers.
emi.automationera.coral.title: Coral Farm - Coral/Seagrass
emi.automationera.coral.descr: Warm ocean biome, frequent bone mealing, collect with silk touch shears.
emi.automationera.disk.title: Disc Farm
emi.automationera.disk.descr: Use trapdoors to separate creepers; player AFKs while skeletons shoot creepers for discs.
emi.automationera.drainer.title: Drainer
emi.automationera.drainer.descr: Commonly used in world eaters to drain liquids.
emi.automationera.endstone.title: Endstone Farm
emi.automationera.endstone.descr: Reviving the dragon at the end altar generates new end stone. Repeat for mass production.
emi.automationera.fish.title: Fish Farm
emi.automationera.fish.descr: Fish spawn in ocean biomes and are gathered and killed.
emi.automationera.fishing.title: Fishing Farm
emi.automationera.fishing.descr: Bubble columns and boats trap the bobber; player right-clicks note block, shrieker triggers reel-in.
emi.automationera.goat.title: Goat Horn Farm
emi.automationera.goat.descr: Goats see mobs but are too tall and hit stone blocks, dropping their horns.
emi.automationera.head.title: Head Farm
emi.automationera.head.descr: Turn creepers into charged creepers during thunderstorms; let them kill mobs for heads.
emi.automationera.lantern.title: Carving Machine
emi.automationera.lava.title: Lava Farm
emi.automationera.lichen.title: Glow Lichen Farm
emi.automationera.lichen.descr: Grow glow lichen and collect with shears.
emi.automationera.load.title: Loader - Minecraft Style
emi.automationera.load.descr: Minecarts force-load chunks for a few seconds; use cactus to break carts in Nether and return to Overworld.
emi.automationera.mooshroom.title: Mooshroom Farm
emi.automationera.mooshroom.descr: AFK in mushroom island perimeter to spawn mooshrooms, which are pushed and killed by water.
emi.automationera.nylium.title: Nylium Farm - Warped/Crimson
emi.automationera.nylium.descr: Grow nether blocks with bone meal, collect with silk touch, toggle mode by lever on composter base.
emi.automationera.obsidian2.title: Obsidian Farm End platform style
emi.automationera.obsidian2.descr: Destroy the End platform with a wither to collect obsidian.
emi.automationera.pack.title: Loaders
emi.automationera.pack.descr: Collect full shulker boxes, often used with high-efficiency machines.
emi.automationera.phantom.title: Phantom Farm
emi.automationera.phantom.descr: Trap phantoms with water, player kills them for drops.
emi.automationera.pig.title: Pig Farm
emi.automationera.pig.descr: Trap adult pigs with trapdoors; newly bred pigs are killed by lava.
emi.automationera.smelt.title: Smelter
emi.automationera.smelt.descr: Quickly smelt shulker boxes with lava to get their contents, often used with large machines.
emi.automationera.spider.title: Spider Farm
emi.automationera.spider.descr: Limit spawn height to 1 block for spiders and spawn mobs efficiently.
emi.automationera.stone2.title: Anti-auto Stone Farm
emi.automationera.stone2.descr: Lava and water create stone, which is mined with a silk touch pickaxe.
emi.automationera.stray.title: Stray Farm
emi.automationera.stray.descr: Convert skeleton spawner; use powdered snow to turn skeletons into strays.
emi.automationera.strip.title: Stripping Machine - Logs
emi.automationera.strip.descr: hand holds tool, off hand holds target block; TNT breaks and water collects the drops.
emi.automationera.tbm.title: Tunnel Boring Machine
emi.automationera.tbm.descr: Forward-firing TNT duplicator, uses TNT to clear blocks ahead.
emi.automationera.tnt.title: TNT Duplicator
emi.automationera.tnt.descr: Four designs: two slime-free, coral fan duplication (top right), and coral fan launcher (bottom right).
emi.automationera.tnt3d.title: 3D Bomber
emi.automationera.tnt3d.descr: A TNT bomber that moves in three directions, composed of dropper, duplication core, and return module.
emi.automationera.unpack.title: Unloaders
emi.automationera.unpack.descr: When a shulker box is emptied, it is automatically replaced with a new one.
emi.automationera.vine.title: Vine Farm
emi.automationera.vine.descr: Four-level stair design for maximum yield; soul sand waterway slows and shears collect vines.
emi.automationera.warden.title: Warden Farm
emi.automationera.warden.descr: Trap wardens with slabs, lure with trapdoors, kill by entity cramming.
emi.automationera.worldeater.title: World Eater
emi.automationera.worldeater.descr: Run after digging and building anvil wall; usually consists of drainer and bomber, typically 17x17 chunks.
emi.automationera.bedrock2.title: Bedrock Breaker
emi.automationera.bedrock2.descr: Use pistons and update suppression to break bedrock; some designs require movement trenches.
emi.automationera.brew2.title: Fully Automated Brewing Machine
emi.automationera.brew2.descr: Fully automated brewing system: use a lectern to select potion, chest for bottles and blaze powder, automatic output.
emi.automationera.dirt2.title: Podzol & Dirt Generator / Giant Spruce Tree Farm
emi.automationera.dirt2.descr: Convert stone to moss with bone meal, use 2x2 spruce saplings to create podzol, TNT to break and get dirt.
emi.automationera.dirt3.title: Coarse Dirt Machine
emi.automationera.dirt3.descr: Turn coarse dirt into dirt path with shovel, TNT to break and get dirt.
emi.automationera.flower2.title: Tall Flower Farm
emi.automationera.flower2.descr: Use bone meal to grow and harvest tall flowers.
emi.automationera.furnace.title: Semi-Automatic Furnace
emi.automationera.furnace.descr: Top input for items, back input for fuel (lava recommended), bottom for output. Fuel added semi-automatically.
emi.automationera.furnace2.title: Furnace Array
emi.automationera.furnace2.descr: Fully automatic carpet fuel input, minecart delivers items, furnace smelts, hoppers collect output.
emi.automationera.melon2.title: End Melon Mover
emi.automationera.melon2.descr: Use endermite to lure endermen into melon field; endermen may pick up melons and drop them on death.
emi.automationera.mob2.title: Standard Mob Farm
emi.automationera.mob2.descr: Common mob tower, 2 blocks high for zombies, creepers, skeletons, witches, spiders.
emi.automationera.mob3.title: TNT Mob Farm
emi.automationera.mob3.descr: Use TNT explosion to kill mobs; structure may differ depending on design.
emi.automationera.mob4.title: Pathfinding Mob Farm
emi.automationera.mob4.descr: Lure mobs with pathfinding and solid blocks; trapdoors often used to block spider spawns.
emi.automationera.mobswitch.title: Warden Mob Switch
emi.automationera.mobswitch.descr: Infinitely spawn wardens to fill mob cap (70, or 70n+1 for multiplayer) and prevent other mobs from spawning.
emi.automationera.pearlcannon.title: Ender Pearl Cannon
emi.automationera.pearlcannon.descr: Use a large amount of TNT to accelerate ender pearls for long-range teleport.
emi.automationera.snow2.title: Snowball Farm
emi.automationera.snow2.descr: TNT explosion destroys snow golem trails to get snowballs.
emi.automationera.sugarcane2.title: Piston Worm Sugarcane Farm
emi.automationera.sugarcane2.descr: Redstone clock triggers piston worm to harvest, minecarts collect crops.
emi.automationera.suppression.title: Update Suppressor (Very Risky)
emi.automationera.suppression.descr: Massive updates cause memory overflow/type errors/stack overflow to force skipping pending updates; used for door cutting/duplication.
emi.automationera.suppression2.title: Minimal Update Suppressor (Needs Carpet Mod in Newer Versions)
emi.automationera.suppression2.descr: Use noteblocks to produce lots of updates, freezing the update queue.
emi.automationera.tntcannon.title: TNT Cannon
emi.automationera.tntcannon.descr: Multiple TNT explosions launch another TNT to explode at target.
emi.automationera.wood2.title: All Tree Types Farm
emi.automationera.wood2.descr: Complex machine automatically processes logs and leaves; moves logs to explosion chamber for collection; some machines adaptable for different trees.
emi.automationera.tut_logic.title: Tutorial - Basic Logic Gates
emi.automationera.tut_logic.descr: Basic redstone logic gate implementations. Repeaters as diodes; torch as NOT gate. Green = input, red = output.
emi.automationera.tut_0tcircuit.title: Tutorial - Zero-Tick Piston/Zero-Tick Pulse Generator
emi.automationera.tut_0tcircuit.descr: Use timing and schedule control for piston signals <1gt. Short pulses move blocks without retraction or entity movement.
emi.automationera.tut_bedrock.title: Tutorial - Bedrock Phasing
emi.automationera.tut_bedrock.descr: With 1 block above, use a ladder to get on top, right-click ender pearl at block edge to phase through; retry if it fails.
emi.automationera.tut_bud.title: Block Update Detector (BUD)
emi.automationera.tut_bud.descr: Redstone devices utilizing block updates, usually based on pistons; place circuits in unstable state, triggered by neighbor updates.
emi.automationera.tut_clock.title: Tutorial - Redstone Clock
emi.automationera.tut_clock.descr: Face-to-face hoppers transfer items, redstone block restricts transfer. Multi-stage for multiplied delay.
emi.automationera.tut_cud.title: Comparator Update Detector (CUD)
emi.automationera.tut_cud.descr: Detects entity value updates. Comparator 'realizes' state on NC or comparator update.
emi.automationera.tut_elevator.title: Tutorial - Water Elevator
emi.automationera.tut_elevator.descr: Soul sand for up, magma block for down. Use kelp to make source blocks for easy water elevator setup.
emi.automationera.tut_hfcircuit.title: Tutorial - High-Frequency Circuits
emi.automationera.tut_hfcircuit.descr: Common high-frequency circuit designs: from 1gt pulse to 6gt pulse. Face-to-face observer circuits are typical.
emi.automationera.tut_performance.title: Tutorial - Performance
emi.automationera.tut_performance.descr: TPS and MSPT are key values; lag increases MSPT and lowers TPS. World eaters, too many entities, update suppressors all cause lag.
emi.automationera.tut_qc.title: Tutorial - Quasi-Connectivity / QC Activation (BUD Activation)
emi.automationera.tut_qc.descr: Droppers/dispensers/pistons can be activated by powering the block above. Immediate (direct) or update (neighbor block) activation.
emi.automationera.tut_railtransportation: Transport machines include loaders, unloaders, and fast unloaders. Hopper minecarts collect, chest minecarts transport; hoppers pull items from above.
emi.automationera.tut_itemtransportation: Items can be moved by hoppers, water streams, ice tracks, bubble columns, portals, dropper chains, piston launches. Some methods suit the Nether.
emi.automationera.tut_random.title: Tutorial - Randomizer
emi.automationera.tut_random.descr: Uses droppers/dispensers to randomly output items with different stack sizes, emitting different redstone signals.
emi.automationera.tut_tick.title: Tutorial - Tick
emi.automationera.tut_tick.descr: Game tick: basis for all updates. Chunk tick, random tick, redstone tick, scheduled tick.
emi.automationera.tut_update.title: Tutorial - NC/PP Block Updates
emi.automationera.tut_update.descr: Block updates: changes when blocks are placed/removed. NC: neighbor change update for redstone, PP: neighbor notify for block attachment.
emi.automationera.tut_perimeter.title: Tutorial - Perimeter
emi.automationera.tut_perimeter.descr: 17x17 chunk empty area from bedrock to top. Built by world eater, optional anvil walls to prevent explosion/liquid spread.
emi.automationera.tut_railway.title: Tutorial - Mob Transportation
emi.automationera.tut_railway.descr: Use rails for large-scale, cross-dimensional mob transport; push into portal, minecart returns. For few mobs, use ice track.
emi.automationera.tut_iceway.title: Tutorial - Ice Road Speedrun
emi.automationera.tut_iceway.descr: Nether ceiling ice boat highway for fast travel. Use buttons to prevent mob spawns.
emi.automationera.tut_flying.title: Tutorial - Piston Worm
emi.automationera.tut_flying.descr: Slime/honey-based trackless movers. Variants with and without observers; use quasi-connectivity.
emi.automationera.tut_unit.title: Tutorial - Units (Time/Distance/Counting)
emi.automationera.tut_unit.descr: Common in-game units; shulker box in chest = 'box in chest'. Distances marked as side length, not area/volume.
emi.automationera.tut_term.title: Tutorial - Game Terms
emi.automationera.tut_term.descr: Common terms: OP=operator, AFK, Vanilla, Pigman=zombified piglin, Enderman, Skeleton, Redstone, Automation Farm, AFK Farm.
emi.automationera.armorer_in.title: Armorer Acquisition
emi.automationera.armorer_out.title: Armorer Buy
emi.automationera.butcher_in.title: Butcher Acquisition
emi.automationera.butcher_out.title: Butcher Buy
emi.automationera.farmer_in.title: Farmer Acquisition
emi.automationera.farmer_out.title: Farmer Buy
emi.automationera.farmer_out.descr: Mainly sells bread and golden carrots.
emi.automationera.fisherman_in.title: Fisherman Acquisition
emi.automationera.fisherman_out.title: Fisherman Buy
emi.automationera.fletcher_in.title: Fletcher Acquisition
emi.automationera.fletcher_out.title: Fletcher Buy
emi.automationera.fletcher_in.descr: Mainly acquires sticks, string, and hooks.
emi.automationera.leatherworker_in.title: Leatherworker Acquisition
emi.automationera.librarian_in.title: Librarian Acquisition
emi.automationera.librarian_out.title: Librarian Buy
emi.automationera.librarian_out.descr: Mainly sells enchanted books and name tags.
emi.automationera.cleric_in.title: Cleric Acquisition
emi.automationera.cleric_out.title: Cleric Buy
emi.automationera.cleric_in.descr: Mainly acquires rotten flesh and gold ingots.
emi.automationera.cleric_out.descr: Mainly sells redstone and bottles o' enchanting.
emi.automationera.cartographer_in.title: Cartographer Acquisition
emi.automationera.cartographer_out.title: Cartographer Buy
emi.automationera.shepherd_in.title: Shepherd Acquisition
emi.automationera.shepherd_out.title: Shepherd Buy
emi.automationera.mason_in.title: Mason Acquisition
emi.automationera.mason_out.title: Mason Buy
emi.automationera.toolsmith_in.title: Toolsmith Acquisition
emi.automationera.toolsmith_out.title: Toolsmith Buy
emi.automationera.toolsmith_out.descr: Mainly sells bells and diamond tools.
emi.automationera.weaponsmith_in.title: Weaponsmith Acquisition
emi.automationera.weaponsmith_out.title: Weaponsmith Buy
emi.automationera.weaponsmith_out.descr: Mainly sells bells and diamond weapons.
emi.automationera.wanderingtrader_in.des: Mainly acquires water bottles. Unless in Skyblock, then leads.
emi.automationera.wanderingtrader_out.de: Mainly sells blue ice and potions. Unless in Skyblock, then leads.
